meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear

meanings.meaning: be dying for something/to do something

examples.korean: The kids wanted to go on the dodgems. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들은 도젬을 타러 가고 싶어 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She wants to be a ballet dancer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 발레 무용수[발레리라]가 되고 싶어 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Most managements are keen to avoid strikes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대부분의 경영진들이 파업은 꼭 피하고 싶어 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Most managements are keen to avoid strikes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He ached to be home with his loved ones. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 사랑하는 사람들이 있는 집에 가고 싶어 못 견딜 정도였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He ached to be home with his loved ones. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He had always wanted to go caving. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 항상 동굴 탐험을 가고 싶어 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
